QAs.question: I have read many reviews saying that copper wire is missing. What i should do if I find it missing and why it is happening?

QAs.question: Is the copper wire/ inter connecting pipe included in the box in 2022 model? I can see customer reviews complaining that they are not included.
QAs.answer: Copper pipes are included inside the Outer unit box of all brands of AC. Delivery guys or Amazon Warehouse steal them cleverly from the sealed Outer unit box. If there are 3 strings of Plastic wire wrapped around the Outer unit box then you might find the Copper pipes inside but if there are only 2 plastic wires, then the copper pipes will surely be missing/stolen. Return the replace the order  until you get the copper pipes. Installation guy will charge you Rs.1120 per Meter and Amazon customer service will give refund only for Rs.750 per meter which is very very unfair.see less
